answers.answer: I had my period like 12-13 days ago or so and it was normal...
Also there's no known history of diabetes in my family...

I apologize for not getting back to your sooner.Have you told your doctor about how you feel?  Has your doctor ordered any bloodwork?  That's the very first step.  How's your weight?  Under, normal, over?  How about your appetitie?  What's going on with that?

question: I have episodes where I feel extremely hungry an feel nauseous and dizzy, I feel really nervous at this time also. I have been extremely thirsty the past week or so...I have also been using the bathroom like crazy. I have sudden strong urges to go and I pee a river each time. Yesterday I went 3 times within an hour. I am trying to get pregnant and have been for 2 years...what's wrong with me???!!!
title: Diabetic or something else???!!!
